English: Mount Huaguo in Jiangsu, featured in `西遊記~|`西~`游~记[Xi1 you2 Ji4], tourist destination

d.f: `明~`吳承恩~`小說~《`西遊記~》`中~，`蘊~`育~`孫悟空~`的~`地方~。

English: Mount Huaguo in Jiangsu, featured in `西遊記~|`西~`游~记[Xi1 you2 Ji4], tourist destination
(also the name of mountains in other parts of China)
francais: montagne de fleurs et de fruits
